name: 2048 - puzzle number
description:
The 2048 app is addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!
Very lightweight and offline game.You will really have fun and good time pass.

HOW TO PLAY
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch/match, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins!
2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192

It will be challenged for you to get 2048 or more.
It always show your current score and best score which you individual achieved so far.
